result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Electronic Monitoring and Level 5 supervision.  If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, Defendant to remain in custody until a device becomes available.

Defendant Mellachi Robinson in court with attorney Robert E Webb.  Defendant Mellachi Robinson in custody.  Jennifer Jean Tate appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
Bail/Bond Hearing and Scheduling Conference held.  Parties stipulate as to bail.  Additional statements by Michael W.  Court grants request.  Defense requests adjourned bail hearing date to advise if Defendant has been released.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Motion to Modify Bail Condition received and filed.  bm
Order Granting stipulation to sever cases for trial signed and filed.  bm

Defendant Mellachi Robinson in court with attorney Robert E Webb.  Defendant Mellachi Robinson in custody.  Jennifer Jean Tate appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
Scheduling Conference held.  State moves to sever this matter from Co-Defendant's case (22CF128) based on possible resolutions.  No objection by Defense.  Court grants request.  State to draft order.  Defense requests adjourned scheduling date.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.

08:40 AM Defendant Mellachi Robinson in court by video with Attorney Robert E Webb who appears in person.  Defendant Mellachi Robinson in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 12, Judge David Borowski. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial.  Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 12.  This hearing will be streamed live on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqYxLDHV-xN_RkKf_fE1jjw  Scheduling conference scheduled for February 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Notice of Retainer received and filed.  bm

Adjustment Number: 22A 004596,
Payable Number: 979373,
Receipt Number: 22RP002132,
Amount: $20.00

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 5 Supervision with Electronic Monitoring; no contact order.  If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, Defendant to be released and placed on the waiting list.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Mellachi Robinson in court with attorney Charles Robert Roozen.  Defendant Mellachi Robinson in custody.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Mellachi Robinson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Borowski, Branch 12.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a Preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.   DEFENDANT QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.

No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
